voice.name: en-US-AmberNeural
voice.prosody: A podcast about the first 100 years of the internet

mstts:express-as.prosody: In todays episode we set the ground for season one and you get to know who we are.
Hey Sara! Please explain to me what this is all about!

voice.name: en-US-AmberNeural
voice.prosody: oh gosh... I would like to forward that question to our producer. Take it away Stefan.

voice.name: en-GB-RyanNeural
voice.prosody: Thank you John and Sara. We plan to produce a podcast where we put a spotlight on the recent history of computers. We wrap historical facts about commmunicating technology. In short episodes we talk about the history to hopefully understand the future.

mstts:express-as.prosody: The parser is a compter generated podcast that is written in text and output for you as audio.

voice.name: en-US-AmberNeural
voice.prosody: If you like the format, hear mistakes or have suggestions for improvement, please visit our website and comment. We understand the format in an itterative way.

voice.name: en-GB-RyanNeural
voice.prosody: Starting in 2022 you will get season one about the first steps of sounds on the internet. Stay tuned.
